name: Goblin Defender Mobile
description:
Play as the greatest protector of worlds - a goblin. Stop the impending threat from other worlds and defeat all opponents who carry a threat with them.

Information that can help you:

- In the upper left corner are the health, energy, mana and faith panels.

- To the right of the experience bar is the skill tree. After learning a skill, it can be placed on the usage panel.

- The circles in the center indicate which side the opponents will go from.

- In areas where squares are highlighted, you can restore mana and faith.

- Added immunity to re-stun for 10 seconds.

This project is a prototype for testing the combat system.
